categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Malcolm Dixon (September 1953 – April 9, 2020) was an actor who played an Ewok warrior in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. Stock footage of his Ewok character from the film was later used in the video game Star Wars: Battlefront.
He later worked with George Lucas on the 1988 film Willow, in which he played a Nelwyn band member.
Dixon also appeared in Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory.
